page.title: 20LOCAL INDUSTRY AND CRAFTS
page.content: There is one main source of employment in this area of Bedfordshire and that is the Cranfield Institute of Technology. Farming is also a major industry but actually employs far fewer people especially as cereal growing predominates. Of smaller industries there is the electronics firm Dagnall Electronics which like all the local businesses is a "family" concern. There is much interest in country crafts and perhaps the most famous is that of Cranfield lacemaking - a thriving craft kept alive by local interest.
